Process_Name: Robot Arm self calibrate & proceed to pick component
POPP_Demo program receive image from PPOP module and: 1.Check if component is OK; 2.Calculate component pins offset value
Robot Arm receive component pins offset values and do calibration and plug in component
Check next same component on the tray
PPOP opeartion ends Write Task Status=3
Reset Task Status=0 to release pallet
Task Status=0 Tell conveyor release pallet
